'''Move Interactive, ProduÃ§Ãµes de Software S.A.''' is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] software and multimedia developer.
â
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today.
+
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship [http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle.php?article_id=141] {{pt icon}} and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today.
In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, [[Ugo Volt]], a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed by a Portuguese Company.
In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, [[Ugo Volt]], a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed by a Portuguese Company.
Ugo Volt, was also the first portuguese game to be featured at [[E3]] (2006) [http://www.gesventure.pt/em_destaque/move_interactive.pdf]
Ugo Volt, was also the first portuguese game to be featured at [[E3]] (2006) [http://www.gesventure.pt/em_destaque/move_interactive.pdf]
